Text: Tried all types of mount tools and burning this, but nothing seems to work. Any ideas?
OK, got this burned to disc, and its asking for disc 2, where is it?

Hmm... Other V-Rally 3 Proper-GimpRUS torrents are ~950 MBs and contain to disk images. This torrent only has one Setup.bin. I think your missing some files there. Your username is oddly appropriate for this kind of thing: DOAreu1234, as in Dead On Arrival. lol.
